functions.tag: {tmw:{id:601,type:5001},display:{Name:'{"text":"金線の欠片","color":"yellow","italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"根源たる金線の真髄を組み込んだ明星の宝飾","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"その力は稚拙な金線術を高次へと昇華する","color":"gray","italic":false}]','[{"text":"装備時、中級金線術が強化される","color":"aqua","italic":false}]','[{"text":"---------- Inventory ----------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  ■□□□□□□□□  指定のスロットに入れると","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  効果が発動するタイプの","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"  □□□□□□□□□  装飾品です","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]','[{"text":"------------------------------","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}]']}}
